title: 1/4 MAC screen issue fixed with new League update??
body: Hi! I think Riot changed the narrator voice to this creepy guy's voice yesterday..  Cause today, there was an update for league and its back to the nice girl voice again :) and the mac 1/4 screen issue, where it only showed 1/4 of the screen on 1440'900 resolution  in fullscreen gaming seemed to be fixed. Any other Mac users feel that issue has been fixed too? Thanks! Cause mine's working fine :3

replies.body:
As far as i'm concerned the problem is a little different but still unsolved: the image is abnormally widened and virtually unplayable
https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxBXOXyhDhqCS1hkZHdlUGNvLU0/view?usp=sharing

This is really good news about the fullscreen issue, thanks for reporting in!  The narrator voice can be toggled back to normal while in a summoner's rift match, through your in-game options.  Hope that helps!
My issue with Mac quarter screen is fixed as well, nice, ty
